events.title: Scheduled MCC Inspection Tour
events.description: A visit by DOJ officials to the Metropolitan Correctional Center to inspect the 2nd floor psych observation/suicide watch area, the 9th floor SHU, and Epstein's cordoned-off cell.

locations: New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A visit to the MCC was scheduled for August 15, 2019, by DOJ officials following Jeffrey Epstein's death.
The specific areas to be inspected included the psych observation/suicide watch area, the SHU, and Epstein's cell, which was noted as still being cordoned off.
The request specified that only MCC legal staff should escort the visitors and that they would not speak to any guards due to ongoing investigations.
The correspondence indicates coordination between a Supervisory Staff Attorney at the MCC and an Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding the logistics of the visit.
